info.title: Gram API Description
info.description: Gram is the tools platform for AI agents

post.description: Upload an OpenAPI v3 document to Gram.

parameters.description: The id token for authentication from the speakeasy system
parameters.name: id_token

Location.description: The URL to redirect to after authentication

get.description: Provides information about the current authentication status.
Proxies to auth login through speakeasy oidc.

Location.description: The URL to redirect to after authentication

post.description: Logs out the current user by clearing their session.
Switches the authentication scope to a different organization.

parameters.description: The project id to switch scopes too
parameters.name: project_id

get.description:
Load all relevant data for an instance of a toolset and environment

**Required security scopes for apikey**:
  * `consumer`

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:
  * `consumer`

apikey_header_Gram-Key.description:
key based auth.

**Security Scopes**:
  * `consumer`: consumer based tool access
  * `producer`: producer based tool access
